ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
urlo=baseUrl;
}else{
urlo=java.hexDecodeToString(result);
};
result=java.get(urlo,{	'user-agent': ui}).body();
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[0]
intro=` 
📖 书名：{{@@span.1@text##.*《|》}}
👤 作者：{{@@span.2@text##作者：}}
🔖 标签：{{@@div[style="line-height:2;"]@text##标签：}}
🕰 最新：{{@@.divbg@li.0@a@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@.tabvalue.0@text##\s}}
⭐ 属性：
{{@@tbody.0@tr.1:2@td@text}}`
if(x>1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;
pi=`${urldn}modules/article/reviews.php?aid=${p}&page=${x}`
po=java.ajax(pi)
r2=String(java.getString('#jieqi_page_contents>.c_row@html',po));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}else if(x==1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
r2=String(java.getString('#content>.c_row@html'));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result = intro + pl + r2
result = r2? result : intro
}else if(x==0){
	result = intro;
}
</js>

ruleExplore.author:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
result=null
	}else{
java.getString('td.2@text')
			}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
ml=java.getString('title.0@html')
if(baseUrl.match(/login/)){
java.toast('\n❗请登录账号❗')
}else
if(String(ml).match(/我的书架/)){
java.getElements('tr!0')
		}else {
java.getElements('#jieqi_page_contents@tr')
			}
</js>
ruleExplore.bookUrl:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/自动订阅/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/read\/(\d+)\./)[1]||1;
result=`${urldn}book/${url}.html`
	}else
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/aid\=(\d+)\.html/)[1]||1;
result=`${urldn}book/${url}.html`
}else{
url=String(java.getString('a.0@href')).match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1]||1;
result=`${urldn}book/${url}.html`
			}
`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(result)},{"type":""}`
</js>
ruleExplore.coverUrl:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/自动订阅/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/read\/(\d+)\./)[1]||1;
}else
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/aid\=(\d+)\&/)[1]||1;
}else{
url=java.getString('a.0@html').match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1]||1;
			}
bid = parseInt(url);
aid = parseInt(bid / 1000);
result = `${moo}${aid}/${bid}/${bid}s.jpg`;
</js>
ruleExplore.name:
<js>
if(String(result).match(/jieqi\_token/)){
java.getString('a.0@text')
	}else{
result=String(java.getString('a.0@html')).replace(/.*\>(.*?)\<span.*/g,'$1')
			}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: .c_tag.0@span.1@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.setContent(cache.get('urlss') );
cache.delete('urlss');
let r1 = java.getString('#content .blockcontent@text');
if (r1.includes("错误原因")) {java.longToast(r1);result=[];}
else {
result = java.getElement('#jieqi_page_contents .c_row||#jieqi_page_contents tr');
}
result
</js>
ruleSearch.checkKeyWord: 我的校花女友是性欲处理服务
ruleSearch.name: .c_subject@a.0@text##.*《|》

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
chapter=baseUrl;
}else{
chapter=java.hexDecodeToString(result)
}
result=java.get(chapter,{	'user-agent': ui}).body();
cache.put('chapterurl', result);
result;
</js>
dl@.index@dd,dt
ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
result=cache.get('chapterurl');
mool=java.getString('#pagestats@html',result)
mls=mool.match(/kbd\>\/(.*?)\</)[1]||1;
nid=java.get('nid');
url=`{{getUrl()}}book/${nid}_`
var data = [];
for (let i = 2; i <= mls; i++) {
    data.push(url + i + '.html');
}
data;
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[0]
let oo=getUrl();
let url = `${urldn}modules/article/search.php`;
let uri=`data:;base64,辞晨,{"type":""}`;
try {{
	url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ui});
				}
code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
	}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>
